A HUGE congratulations Amy!!!!!!!!!!

It=E2=80=99s great that you have a po=
sition and can continue your fascinating research. That=E2=80=99s a nice wi=
n for our community!

Best Regards,
Jeff Clune




> On Feb 28, 2017, at 8:=
27 PM, 'Amy K. Hoover' ahoover@... [neat] <neat@yahoogroups.com> w=
rote:
> 
> 
> Greetings,
> 
> I have just accepted a position as Assistant =
Professor in the newly formed Department of Informatics at New Jersey Insti=
tute of Technology <http://njit.edu/> and am looking for a Ph.D. student in=
terested in studying computational creativity and/or digital games starting=
 in Fall 2017. As one of Ken Stanley=E2=80=99s former Ph.D. students in com=
puter science at the University of Central Florida, I have worked extensive=
ly with NEAT and would be interested in continuing this type of research ap=
plied to creativity and games. More about my research is available at http:=
//amykhoover.com <http://amykhoover.com/>. The university is located in the=
 University Heights neighborhood of Newark, New Jersey and is only 9 miles =
(14.5 km) away from New York City. If you are interested in this position, =
please email amy.hoover@... <mailto:amy.hoover@...> with a CV a=
nd one-page research statement. Also please feel free to contact me with an=
y questions.
> 
> Best,
> Amy
> 
> 


--Apple-Mail=_8044600C-AF84-486A-8454-E8D6DFE435B3
